definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
confident and at ease/free and easy
to sprinkle/to shed (tears, blood etc)/fig. free, unconstrained/to write in a free style

sentences.english: All you need is a shortcrust pastry, a well made egg custard, and a sprinkling of nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 所有你需要的只是，一個油酥鬆餅，蛋，和肉豆蔻灑。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning to sunshine streaming through my window and my spirits lifted immediately.
sentences.chinese: 今早醒來看到陽光從窗戶灑進來，精神立刻爲之一振。

sentences.english: It's like putting perfume on a pig.
sentences.chinese: 這就像往豬玀身上灑香水。

sentences.english: Sprinkle a thick layer of borax over the stain.
sentences.chinese: 向污漬上面灑一層厚厚的硼砂。

sentences.english: Splashed on your bare branches are my tears like bloodstains.
sentences.chinese: 獨把花鋤偷灑淚，灑上空枝見血痕。

sentences.english: See world of mortals sprinkled thousand sorrow, fear the debauched heart scattered.
sentences.chinese: 一覽紅塵灑千愁，心慮心焦散天涯。

sentences.english: Spilled water also falls under the roosts rather than into the litter.
sentences.chinese: 灑出來的水會落到棲息架下而不會進入墊料。

sentences.english: The northland corpse heap, such as , the dust spreads Sui Tang in a twinkling, the empire firework time world.
sentences.chinese: 北國屍體堆如麻，塵土瞬間灑隋唐，帝國煙火遍天下。

sentences.english: Sprinkle with Nanami Togarashi when serve.
sentences.chinese: 喫時灑上七味唐辛子粉便可。
靜蕾語新枝，飛雨灑鏡湖。

sentences.english: The little girl tried not to spill the milk while drinking it.
sentences.chinese: 這位小女孩喝牛奶的時候試着不要灑出來。

sentences.english: Arrange the tomato slices on the waffle. Sprinkle with salt and pepper。
sentences.chinese: 烤華夫餅乾，番茄片放在餅乾上，灑一點胡椒粉和鹽。

sentences.english: Sprinkle some Maldon salt all over the pastry top.
Thaw puff pastry according to the package directions. Lightly flour your work surface.
sentences.chinese: 按包裝指示解凍酥皮，桌面灑麪粉及放酥皮。

sentences.english: Tears on the branch with some blood stains.
Falling on the bare twigs with blood stains.
sentences.chinese: 獨把花鋤偷灑淚，灑上空枝見血痕。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
(of garments) against the skin/to line/lining/to contrast with/to assist financially
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
